verses.verse: I commend <S%G4921><s%> to you Phebe <S%G5402><s%> our sister, <S%G79><s%> which is a servant <S%G1249><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is at <S%G1722><s%> Cenchrea: <S%G2747><s%>

That you receive <S%G4327><s%> her in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> as becomes <S%G516><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and that you assist <S%G3936><s%> her in whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> business <S%G4229><s%> she has need <S%G5535><s%> of you: for she has been <S%G1096><s%> a succorer <S%G4368><s%> of many, <S%G4183><s%> and of myself <S%G846><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Priscilla <S%G4252><s%> and Aquila <S%G207><s%> my helpers <S%G4904><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> have for my life <S%G5590><s%> laid <S%G5294><s%> down <S%G5294><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> necks: <S%G5137><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> not only <S%G3441><s%> I give thanks, <S%G2168><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

Likewise <S%G2532><s%> greet the church <S%G1577><s%> that is in their house. <S%G3624><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> my well-beloved <S%G27><s%> Epaenetus, <S%G1866><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the first fruits <S%G536><s%> of Achaia <S%G882><s%> to Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> bestowed <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> us.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Andronicus <S%G408><s%> and Junia, <S%G2458><s%> my kinsmen, <S%G4773><s%> and my fellow-prisoners, <S%G4869><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> are of note <S%G1978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were in Christ <S%G5547><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me.
Greet <S%G782><s%> Amplias <S%G291><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Urbane, <S%G3773><s%> our helper <S%G4904><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and Stachys <S%G4720><s%> my beloved. <S%G27><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Apelles <S%G559><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> them which are of Aristobulus' <S%G711><s%> household.
Salute <S%G782><s%> Herodion <S%G2267><s%> my kinsman. <S%G4773><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> them that be of the household of Narcissus, <S%G3488><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Tryphena <S%G5170><s%> and Tryphosa, <S%G5173><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%> Persis, <S%G4069><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Rufus <S%G4504><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and his mother <S%G3384><s%> and mine. <S%G1700><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Asyncritus, <S%G799><s%> Phlegon, <S%G5393><s%> Hermas, <S%G2057><s%> Patrobas, <S%G3969><s%> Hermes, <S%G2060><s%> and the brothers <S%G80><s%> which are with them.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Philologus, <S%G5378><s%> and Julia, <S%G2456><s%> Nereus, <S%G3517><s%> and his sister, <S%G79><s%> and Olympas, <S%G3652><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> which are with them.
Salute <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with an holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%> The churches <S%G1577><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> mark <S%G4648><s%> them which cause <S%G4160><s%> divisions <S%G1370><s%> and offenses <S%G4625><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have learned; <S%G3129><s%> and avoid <S%G1578><s%> them.

For they that are such <S%G5108><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> not our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> but their own <S%G1438><s%> belly; <S%G2836><s%> and by good <S%G5542><s%> words <S%G5542><s%> and fair <S%G2129><s%> speeches <S%G2129><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the simple. <S%G172><s%>

For your <S%G5216><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> is come <S%G864><s%> abroad <S%G864><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men. I am glad <S%G5463><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> behalf: <S%G1909><s%> but yet <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> have you wise <S%G4680><s%> to that which is good, <S%G18><s%> and simple <S%G185><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>

And the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall bruise <S%G4937><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> shortly. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you. Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> my workfellow, <S%G4904><s%> and Lucius, <S%G3066><s%> and Jason, <S%G2394><s%> and Sosipater, <S%G4989><s%> my kinsmen, <S%G4773><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you.
I Tertius, <S%G5060><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> letter, <S%G1992><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Gaius <S%G1050><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> host, <S%G3581><s%> and of the whole <S%G3650><s%> church, <S%G1577><s%> salutes <S%G782><s%> you. Erastus <S%G2037><s%> the chamberlain <S%G3623><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> salutes <S%G782><s%> you, and Quartus <S%G2890><s%> a brother. <S%G80><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is of power <S%G1410><s%> to establish <S%G4741><s%> you according <S%G2596><s%> to my gospel, <S%G2098><s%> and the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the mystery, <S%G3466><s%> which was kept secret <S%G4601><s%> since the world <S%G166><s%> began,

But now <S%G3568><s%> is made <S%G5319><s%> manifest, <S%G5319><s%> and by the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4397><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of the everlasting <S%G166><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> for the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith: <S%G4102><s%>

To God <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> wise, <S%G4680><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea
